format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "

Quotation
{{ doc.name }}

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "customer_name", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "To"}, {"fieldname": "contact_display", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "Attention"}, {"fieldname": "designation", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Designation"}, {"fieldname": "contact_mobile", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Mobile No"}, {"fieldname": "phone", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Phone"}, {"fieldname": "contact_email", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Contact Email"}, {"fieldname": "address_display", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Address"}, {"fieldname": "subject", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Subject"}, {"fieldname": "customer_rfq_number", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "RFQ #"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "transaction_date", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Date"}, {"fieldname": "company", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Company"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

Dear Sir,
We would like to express our sincere gratitude and thank you for your interest in our services.
Herewith, we would like to submit our proposal for {%if doc.subject!=None%}{{doc.subject}}{%endif%} for your kind consideration and perusal.

1. Location Of Supply:
{%if doc.location!=None%}

  • {{doc.location}}
{%endif%}

2. Schedule:
{%if doc.delivery_date!=None%}
  • {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.delivery_date).strftime('%d-%m-%Y') }}
{%endif%}
{%if doc.terms!=None%}{{doc.terms}}{%endif%}

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
6. Commercial Rates: "}, {"fieldname": "items", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Items", "visible_columns": [{"fieldname": "item_code", "print_width": "150px", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "description", "print_width": "300px", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "image", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "qty", "print_width": "100px", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "uom", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "discount_amount", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "rate", "print_width": "100px", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "amount", "print_width": "100px", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "weight_uom", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "stock_balance", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "additional_notes", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}]}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

7. Note:
• All the prices offered in this quotation are exclusive of VAT (Value Added Tax). VAT shall be added on the invoice as applicable to the service.
• Standby/Idle time of the Axis Inspection crew at client site shall be chargeable if there are no assigned tasks or if the assigned task cannot be completed for any reason outside of the crew’s control.
• Minimum daily charge is for {%if doc.subject!=None%}{{doc.subject}}{%endif%} hours.
• Overtime shall be chargeable as {%if doc.subject!=None%}{{doc.subject}}{%endif%}.

8. Tenders Validity:
• This proposal is valid up to {%if doc.valid_till!=None%}{{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.valid_till).strftime('%d-%m-%Y') }}{%endif%}.

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "9. Payment Terms:"}, {"fieldname": "payment_schedule", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Payment Schedule", "visible_columns": [{"fieldname": "description", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "due_date", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "payment_amount", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "mode_of_payment", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "coupon_code", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Coupon Code"}, {"fieldname": "referral_sales_partner", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Referral Sales Partner"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "grand_total", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Grand Total"}, {"fieldname": "rounded_total", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Rounded Total"}, {"fieldname": "in_words", "print_hide": 0, "label": "In Words"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

We hope you will find our proposal/offer favorable to your organization. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any further inquiries.

Thank you.
Sincerely yours,


"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
Prepared By:





{{frappe.db.get_value("User",frappe.session.user,"full_name")}}
Marketing Representative
"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
Approved By:





Ohud A. Al-Harbi
Business Development Manager
"}]

format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": " "}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "



Date:{{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(frappe.utils.nowdate()).strftime('%d-%m-%Y') }}

Attention to all Our Valued Customers,

Subject:- Company Contact Information Update.

Axis would like to update your company contact information. Please fill the fields provided below and send back to our email id info@axis-inspection.com & ohud@axis-inspection.com. Please type all information Both the Language Arabic and English in computerize written forms, No Hand Written.


Our Vendor Number
Company Name
CR Number
VAT Number
Telephone Number
Fax Number
Generic E-Mail ID
Address :-Street
P.O.BOX
Postal Code
City
Country
Contact of Procurement Team & Email ID
Contact of Accounts Team and Email ID

 
 
 
 

Kindly contact us for any changes regarding your company information though our email ID (info@axis-inspection.com) or Fax 966 13 865 1318 every year.
Provide us Valid CR Copy, VAT Copy for our records.


 
 
 
 
 
 

Name of Authorized Signatory


 
 
 
 
 
 

Signature


 
 
 
 

Company Seal or Stamp

"}]
name: Company Contact Information Update
